data.eml:eml: New and little known species of ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from Cameroon

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niedbała, Wojciech, Starý, Josef (2014): New and little known species of ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from Cameroon. Zootaxa 3889 (1): 31-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3889.1.2
